EmailTemplate.description: SFDC-4731: Send email alert to a user when exception is approved
EmailTemplate.name: Product Selection Exception Approval Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Exception request for Opportunity {!Opportunity.Opportunitynum__c} has been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Exception request for Legal Entity {!Opportunity.LegalEntity__c} on Opportunity {!Opportunity.Opportunitynum__c} has been approved. Please click on the below link to proceed with updating the pricing for added products.
Opportunity Record: {!Opportunity.Link}
Thanks, IHS Markit
